name: @resin/abstract-sql-compiler
description: A translator for abstract sql into sql.

scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run prepublish
scripts.prepublish: coffee -c AbstractSQLCompiler.coffee && ometajs2js --input AbstractSQLOptimiser.ometajs --output AbstractSQLOptimiser.js && ometajs2js --input AbstractSQLRules2SQL.ometajs --output AbstractSQLRules2SQL.js
